meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Becky Hammer Doug Butler Alex Jacob Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7048.

td.p: Becky Hammer, an environmental lawyer from Alexandria, Virginia
Doug Butler, a graduate student in medieval history from Columbia, Missouri
Alex Jacob, a currency trader from Chicago, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $72,200)

tr.td: WOMEN ON A PEDESTAL
RIVER BANK ON IT
A MIXED BAG OF MIXED BAGS
"UBE" JOB
THE NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS
